thread.title: Rajinikanth floors onlookers by touching Amitabh Bachchan’s feet
thread.title_full: Rajinikanth floors onlookers by touching Amitabh Bachchan’s feet - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rajinikanth floors onlookers by touching Amitabh Bachchan’s feet
text:
Tamil Nadu's heart beats for superstar Rajinikanth. However when it comes to his own heart, Rajini has left a big place in it for the Indian cinema legend Amitabh Bachchan.
READ: Amitabh Bachchan: Don't ask me where I get energy from
Listen to songs of Amitabh Bachchan on Gaana.com
Onlookers at a sports event in Chennai last week were floored when they saw Rajini touch Big B's feet. Humility and respect come naturally to Rajini even though he is a legend in his own right. They should make more like him!
